|stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.2 |pwr_conn = AC (direct) |serial = yes,, |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = DFS (master), DFS (slave), |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U12H318 |manuf_rev = T00 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/15/2015 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7603EN; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612E;MT7612EN, 1416-BMAL, DTP06K65; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "U12H318 801780 GP REV.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[Foxconn]] U12H318. Radio chip IDs are not clear. The MT7603EN is a guess based on similar devices of the time with a MT7621ST CPU. :DFS was added in a Class II Permissive Change on 11/30/2015 *Web GUI: http://www.mywifiext.net ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_ex6150 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/ex6150 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7621 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = |unsupportedfuncntions = AP-Extender toggle-switch |comment = }} *[https://github.com/openwrt/openwrt/commit/3f019bf96cdf52668750f67cb139fa1b5c538f0b ''ramips: add Netgear EX6150'' on '''OpenWrt''' GitHub] ([https://github.com/openwrt/openwrt/blob/3f019bf96cdf52668750f67cb139fa1b5c538f0b/target/linux/ramips/image/mt7621.mk MT7621]) 
  Device/netgear_ex6150
  DTS := EX6150
  DEVICE_TITLE := Netgear EX6150
  DEVICE_PACKAGES := kmod-mt76x2 wpad-basic
  NETGEAR_BOARD_ID := U12H318T00_NETGEAR

SoC:   MediaTek MT7621
RAM:   64M (Winbond W9751G6KB-25)
FLASH: 16MB (Macronix MX25L12835F)
WiFi:  MediaTek MT7662E bgn 2SS
WiFi:  MediaTek MT7662E nac 2SS
BTN:   ON/OFF - Reset - WPS - AP/Extender toggle
LED:    - Arrow Right (blue)
        - Arrow Left (blue)
        - WiFi 1 (red/green)
        - WiFi 2 (red/green)
        - Power (green/amber)
        - WPS (Green)
UART:  UART is present as Pads on the backside of the PCB.
       They are located on the other side of the Ethernet port.
       3.3V - GND - TX - RX / 57600-8N1
       3.3V is the nearest one to the antenna connectors
